reviews.review: Such an amazing game, I'm glad I played this in college. ;)

Great game, puzzles arent too hard, just takes a bit of brainpower and thinking out of the box. Story is pretty interesting too.

Do I need to say anything about this game? It's fucking incredibly unique and at a time where valve was at their creative peak. I love it and it's on of my favorite's of all time (that and the sequel).

今買っても十分楽しめます。パズルの難易度も簡単すぎず、積むこともなかったです。
ただのパズルゲーだと思ってたら。。。

セール時にPortal2とセットで買うと安いのでおすすめです。
あと、酔う人は結構酔います。自分も一回だけですがかなり酔いました。でも酔いつつ激しい吐き気に襲われながらも2面ほどクリアしました。酔ったらすぐに休憩しましょう。

When I heard about this game I thought it was just another puzzle game with a bit of co-op. But i've just finished the main story right now and I have to say this is one of the best short games i've played in a long time! I love just how much you can do with two portals and how often it really just leaves you to your own devices, the story was awesome and mysterious, while also funny. Great game 10/10 IGN
优秀，刚开始还不懂，但到后面就明白了玩法，最后面两关很有难度，我不得不去看攻略，真的想不到，厉害的脑洞，想不到的关卡设计，很厉害，不愧是神作。
This one is stupid,another Sci-Fi made up thing. But anyhow,play it
good story,and a very fun game

[i]А сюжет- пройди или умри пытаясь, благо надзорщица "нормальная",[/i]
[i]Атмосфера- шикарна, обезнадёживает и даёт надежду одновременно,[/i]
[i]Синий-оранжевый-синий-оранжевый-синий, убивает и ломает, Portal![/i]
[i]И да, на будущее, ты точно получишь[spoiler]тортик[/spoiler], только жди![/i]

早就听说过Portal系列，夏日特惠7元Bundle 零攻略零铺垫入手   简直血赚。

剧情3小时通关，关卡难度设置得恰到好处，最后一刻灵机一动跳出熔炉 哇！成就感爆炸，靠着少量的提示找寻破绽逃离实验室 探索感和代入感真的太棒了！

极具创意的玩法与关卡设计，简短有趣的剧情，好评如潮不是吹的，是真的优秀！
Great game, great concept. The campaign was really short and I finished it in like 3 hours so it’s a good fast finish game. Something that doesn’t require a bunch of stress or anything while playing.

Great game with a very creative and solid portal game mechanic that requires you to do some thinking to get through the greatly designed levels. The villain, GLaDOS is also very amusing and witty and is perfect for this type of game.

Look, I may have beaten this on the orange box on the 360 and not on PC yet but its probably the best puzzle game i've played yet and is fun to go through the game as fast as possible since i've beaten it on the 360 in under 2 or 3 hours. Would I recommend it? Of course! Best to buy when our Lord and Saviour Gabe Newell blesses us with the almighty sale so pick it up then!

Eu nunca cogitei em fazer uma análise desse game,mas depois de uns dias que zerei o game mudei de ideia.
Então aqui está a minha análise.
Primeiramente você deve estar se perguntando:"O que diabos é Portal?"
Portal é simplesmente um jogo singleplayer de ação/puzzle feito pela Valve(também conhecida como a desenvolvedora da Steam) onde você controla Chell,uma cobaia de testes na Aperture Science.
Lá seu principal e único equipamento é a Portal Gun,uma arma capaz de criar portais.
A Portal Gun funciona de forma que ela cria dois portais(um laranja e um azul),os portais criam uma conexão fisíca e visual,de forma que se você entrar no azul sairá no laranja,ou vice-versa.
A trama se desenvolve em Chell resolvendo vários e vários puzzles com sua Portal Gun na Aperture Science,no objetivo de ganhar bolo([strike]não é zueira[/strike]).
O jogo é suportado pela Source Engine(mesma engine de HalfLife 2,Counter Strike e Left4Dead),uma engine criada em 2004 e que foi atualizada ao longo do tempo(sendo a versão do Portal a de 2007).

[h1]Curiosidades:[/h1]

Portal se passa no universo Half-Life.
Portal foi pensando apenas como um complemento para a Orange Box,coleção de jogos da Valve,fazendo com que os desenvolvedores se assustassem com o sucessso do game.

[h1] Conclusão:[/h1]

Com uma história agradável,gameplay divertido e puzzles de quebrar a cabeça,esse é Portal.
[b] Nota Final:10/10 [/b]

Yes this game was released 11 years ago, but it holds up to this day. Now yes the second game is better, and you can technically play Portal 2 without playing the first one...but why would you? This game is a classic, it's fun and a blast and considering the 2007 release date the graphics look great.
Also lore wise it makes things better in Portal 2 knowing what happened in the first game, just saying.

Also you can probably blow through this game in about an hour or two, so it's not long but still great

10/10

Portal ve Valve yaptığı bir oyun açıklamaya gerek var mı? Efsane oyun alın.

Lo compré en su día por un mísero euro en unas rebajas de Steam. Cuando pueda compraré el 2. Es corto pero valió mucho la pena. Idea magnífica, guión con un humor tan negro y ácido que a veces DUELE, *****, DUELE MUCHO, [spoiler] pero no tanto como que te prometan una tarta y se pasen 3/4 partes del juego haciéndote chantaje emocional y te obliguen a eutanasiar a tu querido cubo de compañía para al final NADA [/spoiler] , la acción magnífica y el doblaje al español se merece un premio, maldita sea. Yo pensaba que me lo jugaría en inglés y tiraría, pero es que el doblaje que han hecho es de quitarse el sombrero. Muy muy bueno. Como colofón, esos créditos del final maravillosos. En resumen: si te duelen los 8 euros que cuesta, espera a las rebajas de verano o de navidad y disfruta de la vida [spoiler] pero recuerda que cuando estes agonizando y mueras y te coman los gusanos, ella seguirá viva, a pesar de toooodo el daño que la hiciste, monstruo :,-( [/spoiler]

The game is beyond incredible! However, what I'd like to point out is that this game lacks the transmission easter eggs as well as the secret ending where Chell gets dragged away. Please fix that in the next update!
Worth every penny, enjoyable experiance even after all this time!
